thi-ap19:4.1: saṁsarantiyā → saṁsarantāya (bj); saṁsarantā me (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:9.2: jātiyāpi ca ekato → jātīsu bahuso mama (bj); jātiyā cāpi ekato (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:20.2: saṅgamaṁ te nidassitaṁ → sammukhā ca parammukhā (bj); saṅgāmantena dassitaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); saṅkamante nidassitaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:29.1: Parisāhi ca catūhi → parisāhi catūhi so (bj); parisāhi catassohi (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:37.2: evaṁ patthesahaṁ tadā → tuṭṭhā evaṁ avocahaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); tuṭṭhā eva patthesahaṁ (pts-vp-pli1); evamahosahaṁ tadā (mr)
thi-ap19:38.2: patthe uttamamānasā → pattauttamamānasā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); pattamuttamamānasā (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:61.2: sutavīrehi sokinī → sutavarehi sokinī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap19:62.2: bhattunopi ca → attanopica (sya1ed, sya2ed); sutānakasakaṁ tadā (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap19:68.3: Rūpasobhaggasampannā → rūpasiriṁ anuppattā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1, csp1ed)
thi-ap19:72.3: Na cāpi te dutiyo atthi koci → na catthi te dutiyā vaṇṇadhātu (bj, pts-vp-pli1, mr); na cāpi tuyhaṁ dutiyatthi koci (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap19:73.4: tuvaṁ māra karissaseko → na māra bhāyāmi tavekikāpi (bj, mr); māraṁ na bhāyāmi taṁ ekikāsiṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
